exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R M : R r : Rbar H : forall (n : nat) (x : R), Rbar_lt (Rabs x) r -> ex_derive_n f n x /\\ Rabs (Derive_n f n x) <= M x : R Hx : Rbar_lt (Rabs x) r Unable to unify "ex_derive_n f ?M2363 ?M2364 /\\ Rabs (Derive_n f ?M2363 ?M2364) <= M" with "forall P : R_NormedModule -> Prop, locally (f x) P -> filtermap (sum_n (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) ((fun n : nat => Derive_n f n 0 / INR (fact n)) k))) eventually P".

original: intros H x Hx. apply H. auto.
